8.5 Error handling

ole-error-args

Function

Signature

ole-error-args ole-error => values

Arguments

ole-error
An instance of <ole-error>.

Values

values
An instance of <sequence>.

Library

COM

Module

COM

Description

Returns a sequence of any other values that were passed in the call to instantiate ole-error. There is no built-in use for these values.

This function is the accessor for <ole-error>'s args: slot.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
